Comments: Wonderful_ miracle cure for heart palpitations.  Unfortunately_ counter indicated with Latuda_ which I start a few months ago.  (Raises the serum levels of Latuda.) Had to switch to amilopine (sp?) and I have a lot of side effects with this new drug.  Too many so I'm not going to take it.

Side Effects: Had experienced burning up oesophagus after taking Cardizem for approx 8 months.  Have had stomach burning and pain for 2 months.  ENDOSCOPY TODAY diagonised ulcers!!  I ceased Cardizem about 1 week ago and my conditioned improved immediately but still some burning and pain.
Comments: My doctor didn't know Cardizem caused epigastric pain until she checked her drug manual.  Thank goodness I looked it up and suggested to my dr that I was sure this was the cause of my problem. It may help to lower BP but who wants gastric ulcers?

Side Effects: When I first started_ ringing in ears_ hot flashes/flushed.  Tired all the time.  Basic walking and tasks a chore_  just beyond tired.  Makes driving hard_ maybe because I feel dizzy and out of it.  Hoping it gets better.  Taking this along with Multaq to control AFIB_ pending an Ablation.  Nothing has stopped my AFIB yet.
weakness_ fatigue_ decreasing exercise tolerance before experiencing chest pain

Comments: This medication is VERY effective for cardiac arrythmias and high blood pressure.
